name: Fillout
tagline: Powerful forms with advanced Notion database integration
description: Fillout combines powerful form-building features with seamless Notion integration. Create complex forms with conditional logic, calculations, and file uploads that sync directly to your Notion databases with field mapping and automation.

rawData.description: Fillout is a powerful form builder designed for teams that need advanced features like conditional logic, calculations, and complex data collection workflows. With direct Notion database integration, Fillout makes it easy to create sophisticated forms that automatically populate your Notion workspace with properly structured data. Perfect for businesses handling quotes, applications, and multi-step processes.
features: Calculation fields for quotes and estimates
Custom branding with logos and colors
Hidden fields for UTM and tracking

enhancedContent.overview:
Fillout transforms how teams collect and organize data by creating sophisticated forms that seamlessly feed information directly into their Notion databases. Unlike basic form builders, Fillout specializes in complex data collection scenarios where you need advanced logic, calculations, and multi-step workflows that can handle everything from customer intake to quote generation. The platform connects natively with Notion, ensuring that every form submission automatically creates properly formatted database entries without manual data transfer or formatting headaches.

What sets Fillout apart is its ability to handle intricate business processes that require conditional branching, real-time calculations, and progressive data collection across multiple pages. Whether you're building a client onboarding sequence that adapts based on user responses or creating dynamic pricing calculators that populate your Notion CRM, Fillout bridges the gap between simple contact forms and enterprise-grade data collection. The result is a streamlined workflow where complex information flows automatically into your Notion workspace, properly categorized and ready for your team to act upon.
problemsSolved: Manual data entry from forms into Notion databases wastes time and introduces errors
Basic form builders can't handle complex business logic and conditional workflows
Difficulty creating professional forms that match brand identity while maintaining Notion integration
solutionsBenefits: Eliminates manual data transfer with automatic Notion database population and proper formatting
Enables sophisticated form logic that adapts to user responses and calculates values in real-time
Provides professional, branded forms that seamlessly integrate with existing Notion workflows
idealFor: Service businesses creating quote calculators that feed into Notion project databases
HR teams managing complex application processes with conditional questions
Sales teams collecting qualified leads through multi-step intake forms
Consultants gathering detailed client information for Notion-based project management
notRecommendedFor: Simple contact forms where basic tools would suffice
Teams only needing occasional form collection without complex logic requirements

faqs.question: How does this integrate with Notion?
faqs.answer: Fillout connects directly to your Notion workspace through a native integration that maps form fields to your database properties. Once connected, submissions automatically create new database entries in real-time without requiring zapier or manual import processes.

faqs.question: What's the setup time?
faqs.answer: Basic forms with Notion integration can be set up in 15-30 minutes. More complex forms with conditional logic and calculations typically take 1-2 hours to configure properly, depending on your workflow requirements.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan?
faqs.answer: Fillout offers a free tier that includes basic form building and Notion integration for up to 1,000 submissions per month. Paid plans unlock advanced features like conditional logic, payments, and custom branding starting at competitive monthly rates.

faqs.question: What are the main use cases for Notion users?
faqs.answer: Popular applications include client intake forms that populate CRM databases, service request forms with dynamic pricing, job applications with conditional sections, and survey forms where responses automatically organize into Notion project trackers.
